statements: SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, organizer FROM Events WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE organizer LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE event_date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT event_id, event_name, location FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM Events WHERE organizer = 'John Doe' AND location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Events ORDER BY event_date ASC, event_time ASC;
SELECT event_name, organizer FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-06-01' AND location LIKE '%Hall%';
SELECT * FROM CulturalEvents WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date, tickets_available FROM CulturalEvents WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM CulturalEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, artist_name, start_time, end_time FROM CulturalEvents INNER JOIN Performances ON CulturalEvents.event_id = Performances.event_id;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM CulturalEvents JOIN Performances ON CulturalEvents.event_id = Performances.event_id WHERE ticket_price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM CulturalEvents;
SELECT event_name, event_location, event_date FROM CulturalEvents WHERE tickets_available > 0;
SELECT event_name, artist_name, start_time, end_time FROM CulturalEvents JOIN Performances ON CulturalEvents.event_id = Performances.event_id;
SELECT * FROM Performances WHERE ticket_price >= 50.00;
SELECT event_name, event_date, tickets_available FROM CulturalEvents ORDER BY tickets_available DESC;
SELECT * FROM cultural_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM cultural_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_type FROM cultural_events WHERE event_type = 'Music';
SELECT performer_name, performance_type FROM performances WHERE performance_duration > '1 hour';
SELECT schedule_id, event_id, performance_id, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM schedule ORDER BY schedule_date ASC, start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM cultural_events
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM cultural_events WHERE event_type = 'Music'
SELECT performer_name, performance_duration FROM performances WHERE performance_type = 'Dance' ORDER BY performer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-09-01' AND schedule_date <= '2022-09-30'

SELECT event_name, performer_name, performance_type, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM cultural_events JOIN performances ON cultural_events.event_id = performances.event_id JOIN schedule ON cultural_events.event_id = schedule.event_id ORDER BY schedule_date ASC, start_time ASC
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT venue_name, address, capacity FROM Venues WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT perfomance_name, event_name, venue_name FROM Performances JOIN Events ON Performances.event_id = Events.event_id JOIN Venues ON Performances.venue_id = Venues.venue_id;
SELECT ticket_id, price, available_quantity FROM Tickets WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, location FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT venue_name, address, capacity FROM Venues WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY venue_name ASC;

SELECT t.performance_id, t.price, t.available_quantity, p.perfomance_name, e.event_name FROM Tickets t JOIN Performances p ON t.performance_id = p.performance_id JOIN Events e ON p.event_id = e.event_id WHERE t.price <= 50;

SELECT e.event_name, v.venue_name, t.price FROM Events e JOIN Performances p ON e.event_id = p.event_id JOIN Venues v ON p.venue_id = v.venue_id JOIN Tickets t ON p.performance_id = t.performance_id WHERE t.available_quantity > 0 ORDER BY t.price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Event;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Event ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT venue_name, venue_capacity FROM Venue WHERE venue_capacity > 500;
SELECT performer_name, performer_type FROM Performer WHERE performer_type = 'Band';
SELECT schedule_id, event_id, venue_id, performer_id FROM Schedule WHERE schedule_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT * FROM Event;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Event WHERE event_type = 'Music' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT performer_name, event_name, venue_name FROM Performer p, Event e, Venue v, Schedule s WHERE p.performer_id = s.performer_id AND s.event_id = e.event_id AND s.venue_id = v.venue_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events, MAX(event_date) AS latest_event_date FROM Event;
SELECT DISTINCT venue_location FROM Venue ORDER BY venue_location ASC;
